personal_statement_what_to_improve: Your written English was not of a standard that we would expect from an aspiring teacher, especially in a subject that requires modelling of high quality writing
subject_knowledge_what_to_improve: The panel felt you did not demonstrate a realistic understanding of teaching Drama at Key Stage 3 and 4 in a mainstream school
qualifications_other_reason_details: It is a requirement for all our Drama trainees to have sufficient subject knowledge to teach a second subject to at least Key Stage 3 and without A levels we couldn't identify an area where you could fulfil this requirement.
